title: physical_address
description: This is physical_address object from the hsda service.

id.description: Each physical address must have a unique identifier.

location_id.description: The identifier of the location for which this is the address.

attention.description: The person or entity whose attention should be sought at the location.

address_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_2.description: The second line of the address.

address_3.description: The third line of the address.

address_4.description: The fourth line of the address.

city.description: The city in which the address is located.

region.description: The region in which the address is located (optional).

state_province.description: The state or province in which the address is located.

postal_code.description: The postal code for the address.

country.description: The country in which the address is located. This should be given as an ISO 3361-1 country code (two letter abbreviation).
